name: Alvearium Automata
description:
Input

Mouse - Actions + Panning/Zooming

Esc - Pause Game

How To Play 

Your hive workers will collect food (🔴) and gold (🟡) for you. At the end of the day you must have enough food to feed your hive or it will die.

When the day is over you can select the best fit pair to continue on your hive's legacy. 

Placing new hive settlements will allow you to expand your hive numbers and domain over the map. 

Sight: Click on one of your workers to see their field of vision. They will gather any material they can carry within their field of vision.

Speed: How fast your workers can move through the map. 

Strength: How much material your worker can carry. Be weary: any materials it is carrying will only be added to the hive once it drops it off.
